data.prayer: Jesus, make the 618 people in the state of Konče who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Konče, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Konče, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Konče to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Konče.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Albanian, Macedonian people. Make the Albanian, Macedonian people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Konče, North Macedonia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Konče, North Macedonia that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Konče, North Macedonia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
